task.title: Sending photos
task.shortdesc: You can send photos to an individual contact or a group from the chat view.

context.p: Perform the following steps to add a photo to a chat message:

step.cmd: Choose the Send Photo action from the chat menu.
Choose Take new photo to take a picture from your device camera, or choose Send saved picture to choose a photo from one of your photo galleries.
Press OK to send the photo, or choose Cancel to cancel the action.

p.note: You can't send a photo to an offline user or to a chat history.
